description: The Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) is a proxy to quantify the vegetation amount. It is defined as NDVI=(NIR-Red)/(NIR+Red) where NIR corresponds to the reflectance in the near infrared band, and Red to the reflectance in the red band. It is closely related to FAPAR and is little scale dependant.
title: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index: global 10-daily (raster 1km) - version 2, Feb 2017

providers.name: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
providers.description: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service - VITO NV
